casebody.data:
FERRELL
v.
PERRITT. No. 407P14-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Dwain Cornelius Ferrell, for Ferrell, Dwain Cornelius. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of July 2015 by Defendant for Subpoena Duces Tecum:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
